title: Emerald and Pearl Hasli Necklace - A Timeless Shobha (शोभा)
materials: Crafted in 18K (750) Rose Gold weighing 4.91 grams. Adorned with 19.01 carats of Emeralds with excellent clarity and brilliance
and 45.35 carats of Freshwater Pearls with high luster. Features intricate Diamond settings.
features: A modern take on the classic Hasli necklace, this piece features a striking geometric design with alternating Emeralds and floral Diamond clusters. Delicate Diamond dangles suspend lustrous Pearls, creating a captivating shimmer. The rose gold finish offers a contemporary warmth, while the Emeralds evoke traditional Telugu aesthetics.
occasions: and special occasions like Seemantham (బారసాల) and half-saree functions. Also suitable for modern cocktail parties and formal events.
description: This necklace seamlessly blends traditional South Indian elegance with contemporary design. The Emeralds are of exceptional quality, and the pearl dangles create beautiful movement and radiance. It is a stunning statement piece that will be treasured for generations, and will definitely be a "Kundan" quality!
